title: (Mon Full) Lunchbox Made the News! + Don’t Fall for This New Car Scam! + Guy Gets Busted Spending Money on a Bank Error
itunes:title: (Mon Full) Lunchbox Made the News! + Don’t Fall for This New Car Scam! + Guy Gets Busted Spending Money on a Bank Error
description:
Lunchbox finally did it….he made the news! He reveals what he did to make it on TV. Bobby shares a story about a scam he feared that even he could fall for that has to do with a note being left on your car. Bobby shares a story about a young man who got busted after going on a spending spree with money that was put into his bank account by accident. Lunchbox doesn’t see anything wrong with it…we talk to callers about the logistics of the error and legal issues.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
